attributes.title: stream: rain on me
attributes.review: if only i could give this app zero stars. it’s a scam. it took a WEEK to download and 1 hour to open. it started asking what color clothes i was wearing and my favorite hour minute and second of 365 days was which i answered with no hesitation. this app doesn’t even work as it’s completely slow and it takes 5 days to actually delete. zont zo it.

attributes.title: Horrible App takes over phone
attributes.review: I don’t know what is going on but this app keeps trying to activate my camera.  It is also using my location services even when I turned it off.  I’m not getting tracked I think it was made by the dems and not our president he would never allow such an invazion of privacy!!!! Stay away don’t download this app!!!

attributes.title: this app is trash
attributes.review: when you first open the app you see a cheeto on your screen like wow not a great start to an app really inappropriate and makes no sense if you ask me. Then the app crashed my phone when i went back to my home screen agh so rude and has continued to crash my phone. I would 100% not recommend you to download this app. Anyway Trump 2020🧚‍♂️✨💕but, on a gravestone🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review:
This app was draining my battery making it die slower and also it hacked into my account, tv randomly turned on, there was some random popcorn in the microwave and my dog was doing the Gangnam style though I thing that’s regular for my dog? It used my location without me using the app which I’m very mad about that. It should ask me for my location first. 😤😤

Also vote namjoon for president

attributes.title: The thruth is its fine
attributes.review: People are say this app is bad because they don't want tik tok taken down. If you support trump get the app if you don't support then mind your on business.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app is completely useless, it took forever to install and wouldn’t even work after it was installed. I am incredibly upset and could not be more disappointed and angry with this app. i should have listened to previous comments saying it wouldn’t work and now i know i never should’ve trusted this app to do anything in the first place.

attributes.title: Absolute Garbage - do not download!
attributes.review: I urge you to not bother with this app. I was attempting to download to continue making America great again, but it took about 48 hours just to download. I’m pretty positive the server stole all my private information including my location, and I’m starting to get all of these ads. I highly recommend you support the dearest president in other ways.

attributes.title: It glitch and gave me a virus
attributes.review: So I had this app for some time and every time I open the app it will start to glitch really bad. It also gave me a virus on my phone so I had to get a new one. Also it wouldn’t let me sign in. Totally not worth your time really bad app will start to send you weird messages like where you live and what clothes your wearing. Also ask me to send nudes

attributes.title: A Disgrace to mankind
attributes.review: Everything about this app absolutely a palled me from his world view his plans for this country to the application process and the expectations that they have with people sign up I went on to have a better feel about my dad‘s reasons for liking this man and got up more certain that if he would you ever be reelected it would mean hell for this country
